website_summaries.verdict: No extras supplies needed - little hands simply pop the beads together to create necklaces, bracelets, headbands and more.
pros: Includes 550 pop beads in a variety of colors and shapes - some even glow in the dark
Easy to pop in and out independently
Each bead is made from durable ABS plastic
No string, scissors or other accessories are needed

customer_reviews.title: super fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my daughter's birthday. Spent lots of time researching between the various pop bead options and seemed like this was the best fit. Once arrived I was relieved to find out it was perfect and even her siblings enjoyed them. They are very easy to use, as the beads pop in and out of each other very simply and she is able to play independently. The packaging of the product is probably my favorite part- love the carrying handle, and it's such great quality- so far cleanup has been painless. Highly recommend this product for any kid!!!
customer_reviews.author: OAB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in letters/numbers included
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to have something to do. Didn't know it would have numbers and letters in it but it includes some not all the letters. Does not give you all the Alphabet or all the numbers which made things bad. Can't spell anything without more letters.. if it would have at least included all the letters/numbers at least that would be okay but to not include them, all at least 1 of each, it because pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but they will get everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters (9 & 2) love these beads! The baby is not to put many things in her mouth and there have been no problems with that. But, boy, these things end up all over the floor and in every nook and cranny! No big deal, that’s what brooms and grandmas are for.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Del Riego

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect entertainment for my 5 year old daughter during our stay at home time! She lovessss making tons of different t pieces with it. It has tons of bracelet and ring guides but there is only one headband, maybe when this set is updated they can add a few more! But we love it
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to use the letter beads to write any word- don’t bother with this set. Can’t even complete my sons name because there isn’t one N in the whole set! There should be several of each letter and instead there are letters missing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Veras

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, lacking some quality control
customer_reviews.text: We love these and they are so fun to put together however, one complaint I have is that many of the pieces are too loose and don’t ‘pop’ together well. This results in creations falling apart at the joints that are loose which can be frustrating for little hands hard at work. I do wish the quality control was better so that this could be avoided but all in all, it’s still a good product. I really like that it comes with a cute carry case and some examples of creations to replicate
customer_reviews.author: A K

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old niece's birthday and she has been obsessed with them ever since. Her parents love that it stimulates her creativity, challenges her and keeps her busy. The kit also includes glow in the dark beads which are super cool. I highly recommend this kit if you're looking for a high quality pop beads kit for your little one!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Best retro present ever!
customer_reviews.text: Got for 6 year old girl and she loooves them. The 9 year old boys at the party wanted to take them home. Super fun to pop together. Great little storage case. The glow in the dark beads are great.
customer_reviews.author: J.Turner

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any craft enthusiast! Easy to use and endless design possibilities. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jason O.

customer_reviews.title: Pop beads
customer_reviews.text: I use to play with pop beads when I was a child, I was so excited to see this toy offered. It allows kids to be creative while having fun, I ordered 3 for toys for tots.Children love to play dress up with these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C Sienna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Activity
customer_reviews.text: Old fashioned pop beads with no tangled string to fuss with. My Grandkids 4 and 6 spent hours making necklaces, earrings and bracelets etc. I bought each child their own case. They do not all glow in the dark, just the greens ones, and some beads don't stay attached on them. . However, all the accessories in the rest of this product worked very well. They spent 3 hours alone making wonderful creations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy for little hands and endless customizations
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for my 4 year old daughter who is now into dress up. It is so easy for her to make anything she desires and the options are endless. So many added accessories like a headband to customize, bracelets, ear rings. Keeps her busy for awhile and even me as a mom finds it something fun to do together!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and I love playing with these. As she says, they are fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne J.

customer_reviews.title: Great creative product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 8 year old granddaughter. She loved it and created her own creative jewelry!! It has been keeping her busy for days.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Locklear

customer_reviews.title: The perfect present.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to see joy in a little girl’s eyes you just need to handle her this box. A real treasure, full of an infinite range of possible combinations to challenge her creativity. These bids are going to keep my niece and her play date friends busy for hours, creating the jewels of their dreams. A plus for parents: BPA and PVC free!
customer_reviews.author: The A’s

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these beads! Perfect for my toddler girls' little fingers.. Work wonders for finger strength .. Pattern building... Super fun!
customer_reviews.author: ChastitieAngel

customer_reviews.title: Such a great gift for my 5 years old girl!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 5 years old daughter and she absolutely loved it! Lots of cool colors and many different styles like earrings bracelets necklaces and more! The price was good for the amount of beads.
customer_reviews.author: meital cohen

customer_reviews.title: great beads
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it. I wish the letter beads were actually a complete alphabet and not random letters.
customer_reviews.author: KJHPAC

customer_reviews.title: Affordable.  Great for crafting girls
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old thinks this a great invention. This is the her “go-to” when she gets bored. I am glad to see them back again. Well worth It.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey freeman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old girl, who immediately fall in love with this beads and made a whole collection for herself. Apparently, her twin brother and 9 year old sister started making jewelry too! The glow in the dark beads are great! We love this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Gil Amoray

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This was my my nieces birthday gift and she loved it. So my styles and there is enough to create so many necklaces, bracelets, headbands etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: coolest gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece absolutely loved this for birthday. She is 5 and played with it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My three year old has trouble connecting them but she sure dose love playing with them...as described
customer_reviews.author: kenneth hamblin the 4th

customer_reviews.title: Not great for a gift but they are cute
customer_reviews.text: These look really cute but I bought them for a gift and they aren’t packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: HWillis

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back!! Does Not Glow In The DARK!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I purchased this item over the others is because they said it glows. Now I'm stuck with this product that has so many of these ugly green beads that do not glow!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camy D

customer_reviews.title: My girls played for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters, ages 9 and 6. They loved it, especially the green pieces, they really glow in the dark! They were playing for hours. Such a great way to get them off their tablets and TV. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Arango

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love these beads. They are versatile and you can make lots of different jewelry. Its a nice activity to do together and a crowd pleaser with her friends when they come over🙂 And they glow in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 3-yr-old granddaughter. She loves it. Has made such a variety of jewelry and collars for all her stuffed animals.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Well please with this product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my granddaughter. She love them, making necklaces and bracelets for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cgreen

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this for a fun night of crafts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Xmas gift for my granddaughter. Easy to use and fun to use for craft night.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product- glow in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: These beads were exactly what I was looking for. I have 2 nieces that love to mane jewelry and they absolutely loved that they were glow in the dark. Perfect for crafting and making necklaces!
customer_reviews.author: Elan Kotz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old niece loved this gift! So many different pieces. Durable! She loved the glow in the dark pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 7 yr old granddaughter. She was absolutely thrilled and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Larson

customer_reviews.title: Adorable gift for my nieces!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nieces for Christmas and they loved it! The box makes for easy storage when they aren’t playing with the beads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Some Very small pieces among the beads. Definitely not for 3yrs or younger.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fun play time!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this so much variety and the possibilities of what to make are endless!
customer_reviews.author: David Alima

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product!! My kids love making necklaces, earrings and all sorts of cool things with them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son both loved these. The pop beads let them be so creative and imaginative!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander E.

customer_reviews.title: Almost 3yr old loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use,and they come in a great storage bucket
customer_reviews.author: Patty

product_meta.title: TS Yuniku Pop Beads For Kids 550 Pieces, DIY Jewelry Making Kit Arts And Craft for Girls Age 3, 4, 5,6,7,8 Glowing in the dark Beads, DIY Creativity Set Making Bracelet Necklace Ring Hairband Earrings
product_meta.description:
Color:LargeGlowing In The Dark Pop Beads - DIY Jewelry Making Kit 
The perfect choice for kids age 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 years old. 

A memorable gift for any special occasion, Christmass and birthday gift – encourage your kids to use their creativity to snap together unique creations over and over again, promoting your child’s motor skills, hand-eye coordination and even helps enhance their understanding of various colors and shapes. 

Plastic box for neat storage - this jewelry making kit can easily be stored and accompany your kids on all their trips. 

BPA – FREE – We only use durable ABS plastic that’s Safe and non toxic. 

ASTM Certified - meeting strict safety standards. 

For maximum glowing effect – please allow Pop Beads to rest under direct light for at least 60 minutes 

Package Including: 
New 2020 edition – Glow in the dark beads. 
550 x Pieces Beads 
Headband 
Bracelets 
Rings 
Errings 
Booklet 
Storage box 

Warning: Product contains small parts. 3-4 years old children should play with the toys under guardian supervision.
feature_bullets: GLOWING IN THE DARK POP BEADS - 2020 SPECIAL EDITION: open up even more possibilities for making beautiful and shiny jewelry.
550 PIECE POP BEAD SET: Each craft kit for kids comes with 550 colorful, decorative in a wide variety of shapes and sizes that your kids can use to create anything their heart desires

ARTS AND CRAFTS FOR GIRLS: DIY jewelry making kit encourages your children to use their creativity to snap together: making bracelets, hairbands, necklaces, and rings, promoting fine motor skills and imagination. The perfect gift for little girl's age 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 for every occasion: birthdays, Christmas gift, New Year’s, thanksgiving and more.

EASY TO STORE & CARRY: Our pop beads set comes with a neat box that enables your kids to have fun both at home and on the go. We use a no-edge design to make sure the beads fit comfortably in your child’s hand.

NO THREAD NEEDED: This BPA-free kid toys set is made using sturdy ABS plastic along with a Snap-On design that allows your kids to attach the beads without needing to use any threads. These snapping pop bead toys can be assembled and disassembled multiple times to create a wide variety of jewelry, toys, and accessories.
